articles.author: Cindy Boren
articles.title: Lionel Messi booed by Hong Kong fans - The Washington Post
articles.description: Boos rained down on Lionel Messi, whose balky hamstring kept him out of a friendly during Inter Milan’s Asian tour.
articles.content: Lionel Messi and David Beckham heard boos and chants of refund from fans in Hong Kong, where government officials asked for an explanation for why the soccer star, who plays for Beckhams Inter Miami … [+2757 chars]
